_header: Lordings that been hende and free
Title(s): Duke Rowlande and Sir Ottuell of Spayne
_description: Duke Rowlande and Sir Ottuell of Spayne — 133 12-line stanzas (aabaabccbccb)

BLAdd31042.First Lines: Lordynges þat bene hende and ffreeherkyns alle hedir wardes to mee…
BLAdd31042.Last Lines: …And Ihesu Criste þat boghte vs dereBrynge vs to thi Blisses sereAmen par charite
BLAdd31042.Attributed Title: Þe Romance Of Duke Rowlande and of sir Ottuell of Spayne. Off Cherlls of ffraunce (f. 82); Charlles. Here Endes þe Romance of Duk Rowland & sir Otuell of Spayne. Explycit sir Otuell (f. 94)
BLAdd31042.Editions:
Herrtage,  Sidney John Hervon,
                        ed.  
             The English Charlemagne Romances II: The Sege of Melayne, the romance
                of Duke Rowland and Sir Otuell of Spayne.
EETS
         e.s. 35 (1880); repr. 1973: 55-104.
